AboutMe.title: About me
AboutMe.headline: Who I Am
AboutMe.description: Hey there, I'm Lukas! Write some information about yourself that is IT related. Why are you passionate about coding? What is your source of inspiration for improving your programming skills?
AboutMe.location: Where are you based? Would you be open to working remotely or potentially relocating?
AboutMe.cognition: Show that you are open-minded. Are you enthusiastic about learning new technologies and continually improving your skills?
AboutMe.quality: A brief description of your problem-solving approach. Do you learn from each challenge as you search for the most efficient or elegant solution? You can include some keywords like: analytical thinking, creativity, persistence and collaboration.

Skills.title: Skill Set
Skills.headline: Technologies
Skills.description: A short introduction of your skills. Highlight your experience of using different front-end technologies and emphasise your openness to learning and adapting to new technologies. Show how important it is for you to keep up with the rapid changes in web development.
Skills.contactMe: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
Skills.popup: I have a special interest in learning

Projects.title: Featured Projects
Projects.headline: Portfolio
Projects.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

dataProjects.name: Join
dataProjects.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

dataProjects.name: El Pollo Loco
dataProjects.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

dataProjects.name: DA Bubble
dataProjects.description: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.
